title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Seattle, WA, USA
description:
Bring your laptop and join in the Global Day of Code Retreat on November 15th! It will be a day of fun, programming, learning, teaching, and getting to know other programmers who are passionate about their craft. Food will be provided, so you just need to show up and take part. Just remember to bring your laptop. After we are done we'll head out for some drinks and socializing. 
What is a Code Retreat? Other than being a great place to practice, you might want to take a look at the Code Retreat website (http://archive.coderetreat.org/) for a complete explanation of what to expect. 
 
Sign up on Eventbrite (https://www.eventbrite.com/e/global-day-of-code-retreat-2014-seattle-wa-tickets-13747556311)!
